text:
Hey everyone.

Can you share your productivity tools that you use to make your job easier?
I am particularly interested in AI meeting assistants to summarize meetings with next steps etc. that work with Slack.
But other cool tools are of interest also. Don't hold back :slightly_smiling_face:

Have you heard of <https://www.airgram.io/>? I'm on their free version, and it's been pretty cool, though I haven't been able to fully test out the capabilities. I don't know if it connects with Slack, but I do love that you can create shareable URLs for clients and others if necessary. Another tool I use is <https://audiopen.ai/> to help me get to the point with my writing (I just read my content out loud to it) :slightly_smiling_face:
